      • setSendSmsInterface

        public static void setSendSmsInterface​(EmergencyManager.SendSmsInterface iface)
        Sets the Send SMS Interface to use instead of the default SMS Interface.
        Parameters:
        iface - the implementation to use or null if the default is to be used.

      • hasSmsSendPlugin

        public static boolean hasSmsSendPlugin()
        Used to let the AlertPreferenceFragment know that there is a Sms send Plugin.
        Returns:
        true if one is registered.
